bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of topical swelling resulting from an injury. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 10: 治風腰脚痛不得履地， 及拗折傷腫，瘀血攻痛，三神散方 , “To cure wind causing pain in one’s lower back and feet so that one is unable to walk, as well as fractures with injury swelling , and stagnant blood [having left the vessels and] attacking [other body parts] causing pain, [use the] recipe for the ‘powder of the three spirits ’”.
